text:
1st time ordering with Oceanwaves. Next day delivery.
The items were received frozen and fresh.
The prawns were adult hand sized - Tiger prawns 18 pieces and ang kar 13 pieces. Ordered 1kg of each.
The sea bass was descaled, gutted and cleaned.
Will definitely order again when the need/occasion arises.
Thank you Joanna for coordinating my order.

Fast, polite and attentive delivery! Products delivered always cold and secured bags. Products are as fresh as they can be!! Really good quality! Especially crab lump meat, fresh whole salmon, fresh whole chicken!! Can’t ask for more! Highly recommend!!! 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

Thanks to Oceanwaves, we’ve completed our first round of hotpot feast!

Lovely quality for the beef short-plate slice, pork belly and pork collar shabu.
Thankful for the recommendation of the Hamachi Collars! Super easy to prep.
Thaw it, salt it, oil it, air-fryer it. Yums!

Will definitely order again for the coming CNY festivities. Can’t wait to try the sea bass that’s recommended but we decided against it the last order.
Quality of cod fish, scallops and pork belly are exceptional. Prices are very affordable for the products you get. Will definitely recommend to my friends!
Ordered the beef shank, sea bass, and pork belly for the first time. Everything was fresh, well-packed, and the quality really stood out. I’ll be ordering again soon!
